directions: Bring all ingredients to a boil in a 3-quart saucepan, skimming froth, then reduce heat and gently simmer, partially covered, until reduced to about 5 cups, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
Pour stock through a large sieve into a bowl and discard solids.
ingredients: Neck and giblets (excluding liver) from turkey
1 onion, peeled and stuck with 2 whole cloves
2 fresh thyme sprigs or 1/4 teaspoon dried, crumbled
2 fresh marjoram sprigs or 1/4 teaspoon dried, crumbled
title: Turkey Stock
